abstract: Abel Ferrara, the director of "King of New York" and "Bad Lieutenant," said he had cast Gerard Depardieu and Isabelle Adjani to play Dominique Strauss-Kahn and Anne Sinclair in a film about their lives during a notorious sex scandal. But Mr. Ferrara's producer was less certain that this would be his next project.

headline.main: Abel Ferrara Says He's Making Film About Dominique Strauss-Kahn
headline.print_headline: Abel Ferrara Plans Film About Strauss-Kahn
